languages.text: Очередная вахта на борту пустотного корабля подошла к концу. Лорд-капитан, отдав последние распоряжения, отправил{mf|ся|ась} в свои покои для благословенного отдыха. Впрочем, дрема Вольного Торговца была нарушена изуверскими ночными кошмарами, охватившими {mf|его|ее} разум. Провидение вовремя выдернуло Лорд-капитана из когтей мучительных варп-грез... лишь для того, чтобы лицезреть, как кошмары просочились сквозь неверную оболочку поля Геллера и облеклись плотью в святая святых корабля! К бою!

Another watch aboard the voidship has come to an end. The Lord Captain, having given {mf|his|her} final orders for the day, retired to {mf|his|her} chambers for some divine rest. However, the Rogue Trader's slumber was disturbed by horrific nightmares plaguing {mf|his|her} mind. Fate wrenched the Lord Captain out of the clutches of these agonising warp dreams... only for {mf|him|her} to witness the nightmares seeping through the flimsy membrane of the Geller field and taking physical shape in the ship's sanctum sanctorum! To battle!
languages.original_text: Очередная вахта на борту пустотного корабля подошла к концу. Лорд-капитан, отдав последние распоряжения, отправил{mf|ся|ась} в свои покои для благословенного отдыха. К бою!

traits.locale_text: Another relative day aboard the voidship had come to an end. The Lord Captain, having given {mf|his|her} final orders for the day, retired to {mf|his|her} chambers for some blessed rest. However, the Rogue Trader's slumber was disturbed by horrific nightmares plaguing {mf|his|her} mind. Fate wrenched the Lord Captain out of the clutches of the agonising warp dreams... only for {mf|him|her} to witness the nightmares seeping through the flimsy cover of the Geller Field and taking physical shape in the ship's sanctum sanctorum! To battle!

To battle!

languages.text: 虚空舰上的又一巡轮岗结束了。领主舰长下达了当天最后的命令之后，便回到自己的房间里休息。然而，可怕的噩梦却扰乱了行商浪人的安眠，折磨着{mf|他的|她的}意识。命运将领主舰长从令人痛苦的亚空间梦境中拖了出来……却只是为了让{mf|他|她}亲眼目睹，噩梦如何渗过了盖勒力场的过滤膜，在飞船的至圣之中化成了现实！准备战斗！
languages.original_text: Another watch aboard the voidship has come to an end. The Lord Captain, having given {mf|his|her} final orders for the day, retired to {mf|his|her} chambers for some divine rest. However, the Rogue Trader's slumber was disturbed by horrific nightmares plaguing {mf|his|her} mind. Fate wrenched the Lord Captain out of the clutches of these agonising warp dreams... only for {mf|him|her} to witness the nightmares seeping through the flimsy membrane of the Geller field and taking physical shape in the ship's sanctum sanctorum! To battle!

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰上的又一巡轮岗结束了。领主舰长下达了当天最后的命令之后，便回到自己的房间里休息。然而，可怕的噩梦却扰乱了行商浪人的安眠，折磨着{mf|他的|她的}意识。命运将领主舰长从令人痛苦的亚空间梦境中拖了出来……却只是为了让{mf|他|她}亲眼目睹，噩梦如何渗过了盖勒力场的过滤膜，在飞船的至圣之中化成了现实！准备战斗！

languages.text: Otra guardia a bordo de la nave del vacío ha llegado a su fin. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán, tras dar sus últimas órdenes, se retiró a sus aposentos para un descanso divino. Sin embargo, el sueño {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente fue perturbado por horribles pesadillas que asolaban su mente. El destino arrancó {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán de las garras de estos agonizantes sueños de la disformidad... ¡solo para que viera cómo las pesadillas atravesaban la endeble membrana del Campo Geller y tomaban forma física en el Sanctum de la nave! ¡A la batalla!
languages.original_text: Another watch aboard the voidship has come to an end. The Lord Captain, having given {mf|his|her} final orders for the day, retired to {mf|his|her} chambers for some divine rest. However, the Rogue Trader's slumber was disturbed by horrific nightmares plaguing {mf|his|her} mind. Fate wrenched the Lord Captain out of the clutches of these agonising warp dreams... only for {mf|him|her} to witness the nightmares seeping through the flimsy membrane of the Geller field and taking physical shape in the ship's sanctum sanctorum! To battle!

traits.locale_text: Otra guardia a bordo de la nave del vacío ha llegado a su fin. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán, tras dar sus últimas órdenes, se retiró a sus aposentos para un descanso divino. Sin embargo, el sueño {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente fue perturbado por horribles pesadillas que asolaban su mente. El destino arrancó {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán de las garras de estos agonizantes sueños de la disformidad... ¡solo para que viera cómo las pesadillas atravesaban la endeble membrana del Campo Geller y tomaban forma física en el Sanctum de la nave! ¡A la batalla!

languages.text: ヴォイドシップの1日がまた終わりを迎える。ロード・キャプテンは、その日の最後の命令を出して、神聖なる休息を取ろうと部屋へ戻った。しかし、自由開拓者の睡眠は、頭を悩ませる恐ろしい悪夢に妨げられる。運命がこの苦しい<歪み>の夢の手の内から自由開拓者を引きずり出す…{mf|彼|彼女}の目の前にいたのは、悪夢がゲラーフィールドのもろい膜から滲み出て、船のサンクトゥムで肉体を持って形になったモノだった！戦闘開始だ！
languages.original_text: Another watch aboard the voidship has come to an end. The Lord Captain, having given {mf|his|her} final orders for the day, retired to {mf|his|her} chambers for some divine rest. However, the Rogue Trader's slumber was disturbed by horrific nightmares plaguing {mf|his|her} mind. Fate wrenched the Lord Captain out of the clutches of these agonising warp dreams... only for {mf|him|her} to witness the nightmares seeping through the flimsy membrane of the Geller field and taking physical shape in the ship's sanctum sanctorum! To battle!

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップの1日がまた終わりを迎える。ロード・キャプテンは、その日の最後の命令を出して、神聖なる休息を取ろうと部屋へ戻った。しかし、自由開拓者の睡眠は、頭を悩ませる恐ろしい悪夢に妨げられる。運命がこの苦しい<歪み>の夢の手の内から自由開拓者を引きずり出す…{mf|彼|彼女}の目の前にいたのは、悪夢がゲラーフィールドのもろい膜から滲み出て、船のサンクトゥムで肉体を持って形になったモノだった！戦闘開始だ！

languages.text: Un nouveau quart prend fin à bord du vaisseau spatial. Après avoir donné les derniers ordres de la journée, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} se retire dans ses quartiers pour profiter d'un repos bien mérité. Mais son sommeil est perturbé par d'horribles cauchemars, le tourment est tel que l'esprit {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} l'arrache des griffes de ses rêves angoissants et distordus... pour constater que le cauchemar s'infiltre bel et bien à travers la membrane fragile du champ de Geller et prend forme dans le sanctum sanctorum ! Aux armes !
languages.original_text: Another watch aboard the voidship has come to an end. The Lord Captain, having given {mf|his|her} final orders for the day, retired to {mf|his|her} chambers for some divine rest. However, the Rogue Trader's slumber was disturbed by horrific nightmares plaguing {mf|his|her} mind. Fate wrenched the Lord Captain out of the clutches of these agonising warp dreams... only for {mf|him|her} to witness the nightmares seeping through the flimsy membrane of the Geller field and taking physical shape in the ship's sanctum sanctorum! To battle!

traits.locale_text: Un nouveau quart prend fin à bord du vaisseau spatial. Après avoir donné les derniers ordres de la journée, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} se retire dans ses quartiers pour profiter d'un repos bien mérité. Mais son sommeil est perturbé par d'horribles cauchemars, le tourment est tel que l'esprit {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} l'arrache des griffes de ses rêves angoissants et distordus... pour constater que le cauchemar s'infiltre bel et bien à travers la membrane fragile du champ de Geller et prend forme dans le sanctum sanctorum ! Aux armes !

languages.text: Eine weitere Wachschicht an Bord des Leereschiffs ist vorüber. Der Lord Captain hat {mf|seinen|ihren} letzten Befehl des Tages erteilt und sich in {mf|seine|ihre} Gemächer zurückgezogen, um sich ein wenig göttliche Rast zu gönnen. Der Schlaf {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde jedoch von grauenhaften Albträumen gestört, die {mf|seinen|ihren} Verstand plagten. Das Schicksal riss den Lord Captain aus den Klauen dieser quälenden Warpträume ... nur um {mf|ihn dann Zeuge|sie dann Zeugin} werden zu lassen, wie diese Albträume durch die dünne Membran des Gellerfelds sickerten und im Sanctum sanctorum des Schiffs physische Gestalt annahmen! In die Schlacht!
languages.original_text: Another watch aboard the voidship has come to an end. The Lord Captain, having given {mf|his|her} final orders for the day, retired to {mf|his|her} chambers for some divine rest. However, the Rogue Trader's slumber was disturbed by horrific nightmares plaguing {mf|his|her} mind. Fate wrenched the Lord Captain out of the clutches of these agonising warp dreams... only for {mf|him|her} to witness the nightmares seeping through the flimsy membrane of the Geller field and taking physical shape in the ship's sanctum sanctorum! To battle!

In die Schlacht!

languages.text: Uçsuz gemisinde bir nöbet daha sona erdi. Lord Kaptan, günün son emirlerini verdikten sonra dinlenmek için odasına çekildi. Ancak uykusu, zihnini saran korkunç kâbuslarla bölündü. Bu acı verici öteboyut rüyalarından kurtulmayı başardı... Sonrasındaysa kâbusların Geller alanını aşarak geminin kutsal alanında fiziksel bir biçim aldığını gördü! Savaşa!
languages.original_text: Another watch aboard the voidship has come to an end. The Lord Captain, having given {mf|his|her} final orders for the day, retired to {mf|his|her} chambers for some divine rest. However, the Rogue Trader's slumber was disturbed by horrific nightmares plaguing {mf|his|her} mind. Fate wrenched the Lord Captain out of the clutches of these agonising warp dreams... only for {mf|him|her} to witness the nightmares seeping through the flimsy membrane of the Geller field and taking physical shape in the ship's sanctum sanctorum! To battle!
